name: UpdateApexDomain
description:
Update or move the apex domain configuration.

This tool updates or moves the apex domain configuration. It is not used for updating auto-renew or nameservers, for which separate endpoints should be used.

parameters.name: apex_domain_name
parameters.description: The apex domain to update or move. Accepts a string value representing the domain name (e.g., 'example.com').

parameters.name: domain_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object detailing the specific updates or moves for the apex domain configuration.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team to perform the domain update on behalf of. This allows the request to be associated with a specific team.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug identifying the Team on whose behalf the request is made.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.
